description: Sync documentation changes to NotebookLM. Triggers when markdown files in root or docs/ are modified via Write or Edit tools.

hooks.command: FILE_PATH="$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$FILE_PATH" =~ \.md$ ]] && { [[ "$FILE_PATH" =~ ^\./[^/]+\.md$ ]] || [[ "$FILE_PATH" =~ ^\./docs/ ]]; } && [[ ! "$FILE_PATH" =~ ^\./\.claude/ ]] && [[ ! "$FILE_PATH" =~ ^\./docs/project_plans/ ]]; then python scripts/notebooklm_sync/update.py "$FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; fi
